snippet: Stephen Colbert renamed Greg Smith "Banker-dict Arnold" on his show Wednesday night. Mr. Colbert was one of several comedians who dissected the op-ed for laughs, Brian Stelter reports in The New York Times.
abstract: Stephen Colbert renamed Greg Smith "Banker-dict Arnold" on his show Wednesday night. Mr. Colbert was one of several comedians who dissected the op-ed for laughs, Brian Stelter reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Late-Night Comedians Riff on Goldman Op-Ed
